author: Brian Bennett
title: President Trump Says Americans Should Cover Their Mouths in Public — But He Won’t
description: It was a moment for President Trump to help convince millions of Americans to do something unfamiliar and inconvenient: wear a barrier over their faces to help slow the spread of coronavirus. Instead, in the White House briefing room on Friday evening, Trump …
content:
